title.rendered: Vnukovo International Airport Contact & Code -Moscow, Russia

content.rendered:
Vnukovo International Airport in Moscow, Russia Contact Address, Phone number, Email, Location Map, Website

Vnukovo International Airport in Moscow, Russia

Airport Name : Vnukovo International Airport

ICAO Code :Uuww

IATA Code : Vko

Address: Vnukovo, Moscow Oblast, Russia

Phone: +7 495 937-55-55

Business hours :

Fax:

Email:

Map: View direction here

Vnukovo International Airport Website: http://www.vnukovo.ru/

Facilities at Vnukovo International Airport, Russia

  • VIP lounge
  • Shops
  • Food outlets
  • Children area
  • Free Wi-Fi
  • Secutiry service
  • Elevators & Escalators
  • Wheelchairs
  • Mobility assistance
  • Parking
  • Medical service
  • Baggage
  • Mother & Child room

List of Terminals in Vnukovo International Airport, Russia

  • Terminal A
  • Terminal D

Baggage Search Service / Unclaimed Baggage contact – Vnukovo International Airport, Russia

Baggage ServicesUnclaimed baggage Services
Baggage Services at Vnukovo International Airport: In case of non-receipt of baggage, damage to baggage/contents, lack of contents, the passenger should contact the baggage search service (Lost and found) before leaving the arrival hall, issue and obtain a baggage failure certificate during transportation (PIR).

If the baggage/contents are damaged, the claim is sent to the Carrier not later than 7 days from the date of baggage receipt.

Terminal A (ground floor)
International flights: +7 (495) 436-77-60.
Domestic flights: +7 (495) 436-28-38.

Unclaimed luggage rooms store unclaimed luggage and items found.

Terminal A

International flights: +7 (495) 436-29-32.
Domestic flights: +7 (495) 436-45-13.

Medical Service at Vnukovo International Airport, Russia

Medical centers location:

  • Second level of terminal A
  • First level of terminal A (for patients transported on stretchers)

Service for passengers with limited mobility and passengers with disabilities

  • If you need help getting around the airport and boarding a plane, please contact our service “Mobility Assistance” in advance by calling +7 (495) 436-61-89.
  • Free of charge.
  • The service Desk “Mobility Assistance” location: Left side of the departure area of terminal A (second floor). a bright yellow stripe on the floor leads to the counter from the entrance to the terminal.

Mother and Child room at Vnukovo International Airport, Russia

Phone number of the mother and child at Vnukovo Airport: +7 (495) 436-29-26

For any additional information about undergoing a medical examination for admission to the room, please contact the medical center: +7 (495) 436-26-28.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Vnukovo International Airport in Moscow, Russia Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Vnukovo International Airport in Moscow, Russia: (click on the stars below)
